Topic.Title: Not being able to create a adventure

Posts.EditableText:
Why am I not able to make a new game/adventure? I'm new so I'm not sure if it's just account age or something else.
Thanks.
Regards, The shortest 7th Grader
Posts.HTML:
Why am I not able to make a new game/adventure? I'm new so I'm not sure if it's just account age or something else.
Thanks.
Regards, The shortest 7th Grader

Posts.EditableText:
Are you using Quest?

If so, check out all the other threads on the same subject recently. You need to add `https://` to the start of the page URL before you create a game (replacing `http://` if it's there). We're not quite sure why this changed.
Posts.HTML:
Are you using Quest?

If so, check out all the other threads on the same subject recently. You need to add https:// to the start of the page URL before you create a game (replacing http:// if it's there). We're not quite sure why this changed.

Posts.EditableText: There is no account age restriction.
